pullrequest.title: [Blueprint] Add support for moving and rotating models

content.html:
I've been printing req.DebugString() here to help place items for subt, and I noticed that single clicking (no dragging) will generate a request of the form:

name: "staging_area"
position {
}
orientation {
  w: 1
}

Would it be possible or beneficial to only send requests that have moved an object?
